issue.title: Fix #176432 biolink.webtena.com
issue.body:
## Fix #176432 


**Pull Request Summary:**
Resolved issue [#176432]  by implementing a solution that is stopping the anti-adblock script before it activates.



**Checklist for a Valid Pull Request:**
- [x] This submission is neither an advertisement nor a bug report.
- [x] My contribution adheres to the project's [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [filter syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters).
- [x] I have thoroughly reviewed my changes.
- [x] My updates maintain the integrity of websites, applications, and file structures.

**Problem Addressed by This Pull Request:**
The pull request resolves an issue [#176432] where AdGuard was being detected on websites, potentially leading to functionality disruptions. 




<details>
<summary>Screenshots</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/73603712/101b2834-a0dc-4e59-8ece-723eb4bd19c7)

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/73603712/d4879c16-f03c-434e-8411-6373072573c9)

</details>

**Additional Notes:**

**Similar Pull Request Notice:**
>This pull request is similar to a previous fix for issue [#176383](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176383), which addressed a timeout prevention mechanism using the presence of this code: 
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176383#issuecomment-2040012679
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/73603712/ac251baa-c2cc-4ad5-8ac2-0297826cb47c)





- [ ] Unblocked advertisements or residual ad elements.
- [ ] Malfunctioning websites or applications.
- [x] Detection of AdGuard on a website.
- [ ] Overlooked analytics or trackers.
- [ ] Social media integrations such as share, like, or tweet buttons.
- [ ] General annoyances including pop-ups and cookie notifications.
- [ ] Routine filter maintenance.

**Consent:**
- [x] I confirm that this pull request is free of private information and meets all outlined conditions.

comment.body:
Maybe a generic fix? `https://www.google.com/search?&q=%22We+serve+ads+so+we+can+keep+our+website+running.+Please+disable+your+ad+blockers.%22`

I tested in AdGuard, and these filters from uBO work fine

https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2023.txt#L1582-L1589
```
#@#.banner-ads
#@#.banner_ads
#@#.ad-zone
#@#.ad-space
##.banner-ads:not(.textads)
##.banner_ads:not(.textads)
##.ad-zone:not(.textads)
~nieru.net##.ad-space:not(.textads):not(.adbox)
```

from chp adblock:

https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2021.txt#L5123
https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2021.txt#L5125
```
#@#.ad-unit
~lamire.jp##.ad-unit:not(.text-ad):not(.textads)
```

comment.body:
Hello, @Yuki2718. It's been a long time.


There have been some changes to the site.

1. The tracker domain has changed.
`astral.nicovideo.jp` -> `stella.nicovideo.jp`
Videos can no longer be viewed if the tracker is blocked.
This can be bypassed using the noopjson rule.
`||stella.nicovideo.jp/v2/watch/member.json$redirect=noopjson`
`||stella.nicovideo.jp/v1/watch/nonmember.json$redirect=noopjson`
<details>
<summary>Screenshot</summary>

![タイトルなし](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/86018494/eeec1f09-4564-4a0c-9889-1574f239bde7)

</details>

2. There is nicoad tracking in the following directories.
`https://www.nicovideo.jp/video_top`
`https://www.nicovideo.jp/video_top/genre/entertainment`
Tracker:
`||nicoad.nicovideo.jp/v1/instream/tracking/`
`||nicoad.nicovideo.jp/v1/tracking/`
<details>
<summary>Screenshot</summary>

![タイトルなし2](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/86018494/09286776-f465-495b-9949-9caab02501aa)

</details>

3. Also, there is a known tracker that is only blocked by AdGuard, can you please add these to EasyPrivacy?
Thank you.
`||nvapi.nicovideo.jp/v1/bandit-machine/`
`||nicovideo.jp/api/logger?`
`||nicolive.cdn.nimg.jp/relive/sp/browser-logs.*.js`
`||nicolive.cdn.nimg.jp/relive/sp/trackingService.*.js`

comment.body:
Не повторяется, сайт не блокируем. Включите также фильтры мобильной рекламы и русский, затем обновите их (подождите около одной минуты), очистите данные браузера, затем откройте сайт.
Если это не поможет, вам следует повторно включить блокировщики контента (веб расширения) в настройках Safari (подождите примерно столько же времени, сколько и при обновлении фильтров).

> При добавлении сайта в белый список его все равно блокирует AdGuard.

В этом случае попробуйте переустановить AdGuard. Если все так и останется, свяжитесь с support@adguard.com.

comment.body:
Реклама блокируется корректно. Какой сертификат использует браузер? Фильтрация для приложения, в том числе по HTTPS, включена в настройках?
Для начала попробуйте оставить только фильтры Адгард вместе с указанными расширениями `Отключить AMP`, `AdGuard Extra`. Затем обновите фильтры, очистите данные браузера, перезапустите его. Также можно проверить сайт в Хром - в нем будет видно какой сертификат используется на странице.

issue.title: Altumcode anti-Adblock
issue.body:
Applies to 

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176432

and

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176383

   
   Maybe a generic fix? `https://www.google.com/search?&q=%22We+serve+ads+so+we+can+keep+our+website+running.+Please+disable+your+ad+blockers.%22`
      
        Maybe a generic fix? `https://www.google.com/search?&q=%22We+serve+ads+so+we+can+keep+our+website+running.+Please+disable+your+ad+blockers.%22`

I tested in AdGuard, and these filters from uBO work fine

https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2023.txt#L1582-L1589
```
#@#.banner-ads
#@#.banner_ads
#@#.ad-zone
#@#.ad-space
##.banner-ads:not(.textads)
##.banner_ads:not(.textads)
##.ad-zone:not(.textads)
~nieru.net##.ad-space:not(.textads):not(.adbox)
```

from chp adblock:

https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2021.txt#L5123
https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2021.txt#L5125
```
#@#.ad-unit
~lamire.jp##.ad-unit:not(.text-ad):not(.textads)
```

_Originally posted by @D4niloMR in https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176449#issuecomment-2041663967_

labels.name: A: In progress

issue.body:
Applies to 

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176432

and

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176383

   
   Maybe a generic fix? `https://www.google.com/search?&q=%22We+serve+ads+so+we+can+keep+our+website+running.+Please+disable+your+ad+blockers.%22`
      
        Maybe a generic fix? `https://www.google.com/search?&q=%22We+serve+ads+so+we+can+keep+our+website+running.+Please+disable+your+ad+blockers.%22`

I tested in AdGuard, and these filters from uBO work fine

https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2023.txt#L1582-L1589
```
#@#.banner-ads
#@#.banner_ads
#@#.ad-zone
#@#.ad-space
##.banner-ads:not(.textads)
##.banner_ads:not(.textads)
##.ad-zone:not(.textads)
~nieru.net##.ad-space:not(.textads):not(.adbox)
```

from chp adblock:

https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2021.txt#L5123
https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2021.txt#L5125
```
#@#.ad-unit
~lamire.jp##.ad-unit:not(.text-ad):not(.textads)
```

_Originally posted by @D4niloMR in https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176449#issuecomment-2041663967_

issue.title: Altumcode anti-Adblock
issue.body:
Applies to 

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176432

and

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176383

   
   Maybe a generic fix? `https://www.google.com/search?&q=%22We+serve+ads+so+we+can+keep+our+website+running.+Please+disable+your+ad+blockers.%22`
      
        Maybe a generic fix? `https://www.google.com/search?&q=%22We+serve+ads+so+we+can+keep+our+website+running.+Please+disable+your+ad+blockers.%22`

I tested in AdGuard, and these filters from uBO work fine

https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2023.txt#L1582-L1589
```
#@#.banner-ads
#@#.banner_ads
#@#.ad-zone
#@#.ad-space
##.banner-ads:not(.textads)
##.banner_ads:not(.textads)
##.ad-zone:not(.textads)
~nieru.net##.ad-space:not(.textads):not(.adbox)
```

from chp adblock:

https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2021.txt#L5123
https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/blob/master/filters/filters-2021.txt#L5125
```
#@#.ad-unit
~lamire.jp##.ad-unit:not(.text-ad):not(.textads)
```

_Originally posted by @D4niloMR in https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/176449#issuecomment-2041663967_

comment.body: @D4niloMR I’ve created a new issue to address this idea

Mobile

AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

1. <comment>
Browser: Firefox mobile 124.2.0

Ublock origin version: 1.57.0

Android version: miui 14.0.13.0.TKOEUVF

Hello. While I scroll Facebook home in the browser often it goes back enough to send to the previous post I've seen. It does the reverse thing if I try to scroll back, jumping forth. Disabling adguard mobile ads filter this behaviour stops.

Looks like its related to ads not being shown but not correctly handled, I could be wrong though.

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~90 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~90 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.
